name: Used Basketball Hoop
description: Our family's outdoor hoop for the last 7 years. They just went off to college and it's just taking up space in the driveway. Hope someone can find some good value for it.

name: Rim Rebounder
description: My kids don't play basketball anymore, so we're selling this rebounder. It's in good condition, and my kids loved it while they were playing.
